titles.title: Teacher Debt Relief Act
Teacher Debt Relief Act
To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to change certain eligibility provisions for loan forgiveness for teachers, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary:
Teacher Debt Relief Act
This bill allows an eligible teacher to use the same teaching service to qualify for both the Teacher Loan Forgiveness program and the Public Service Loan Forgiveness program.
